newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy condemns Tel Aviv blast as "blind barbarism".
newsitem.headline: Italy condemns Tel Aviv blast as "blind barbarism".

text.p: Italy condemned Friday's apparent suicide bombing at a Tel Aviv sidewalk cafe as a vile act of "blind barbarism" and said it hoped the attack would not derail the Mideast peace process.

"Italy's condemnation of terrorism and of these vile episodes is complete and unconditional. There are no political motives whatsoever that can justify acts of blind barbarism," a foreign ministry official said.
Italy hoped that efforts to keep the peace process on track would continue because peace would be "only lasting response to terrorism," the official said.
Up to four people were killed in an apparent suicide bombing at the cafe.
